name: Lonely Lightyear
description:
We hope you've been enjoying the simulation of what life may have been like had B99 not come upon us. But don't neglect your duty of transporting the cryogenically frozen survivors and preserved embryos of those immune to B99 to their new home one light-year away. You might let your ship run while you continue to enjoy your simulation, or you may actively improve the performance of your engines. It's up to you; you're the only human awake for the next few decades.

The initial release, 2020-11-08, is free to play in browser. All updates will be exclusive to paid downloads
